name: New Paths, Old Enemies
description:
Note: You can use the tree's branches for platforming.


Summary

In New Paths, Old Enemies, the theme 'an end is a new beginning' is embodied in the journey of the little fox, who must overcome an old enemy in order to continue its adventure and discover new paths. The game showcases the idea that in order to move forward, we must sometimes bring an end to old conflicts and challenges, and embrace new opportunities and experiences.

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Keys

AD or Right/Left: Movement

Space: Jump

W or Up: Enter the tree and journey through the seasons!

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Story

Join a little fox on a journey of self-discovery and adventure in a vast and beautiful forest. But beware, as old enemies lurk in the shadows, seeking to block your path and halt your progress.

In New Paths, Old Enemies, you'll guide the little fox through a series of challenging levels filled with obstacles and puzzles. Along the way, you'll encounter new friends, explore hidden areas, and overcome dangerous enemies, including the wolf, a menacing foe that the fox has battled with in the past.

With its evocative art style, immersive sound design, and compelling storyline, New Paths, Old Enemies is a game that will transport you to a world of wonder and excitement. Will you help the little fox overcome its old enemies and discover new paths to adventure? The journey is yours to embark upon.
